net.myorb.math

Interface TransformCalculus<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of component values on which operations are to be executed
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PolynomialCalculusSupport<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChebyshevPolynomialCalculus, ChebyshevPolynomialSpaceManager, ExponentialPolynomialCalculus, FourierSeriesCalculus, Fractal.Calculus, FunctionDerivativesTable, GegenbauerPolynomialSpaceManager, JacobiPolynomialSpaceManager, LegendrePolynomialSpaceManager, OrdinaryPolynomialCalculus, PolyMulTest, PolynomialComplexFunctionCharacteristics, PolynomialFloatingFunctionCharacteristics, PolynomialFunctionCharacteristics, PolynomialRoots, PolynomialSpaceManager

    public interface TransformCalculus<T>
    processing for calculus transforms
    Author:
    Michael Druckman
